item.title: EasyTag: a graphical interface to managing your music files' tags
item.author: Author
item.description: Please, if you have not done it, read the Debaday article. Thank you. This article of debaday site, by Dominique Cimafranca, were posted at https://debaday.debian.net/2008/09/14/mythtv-a-personal-tv-recorder/ on 25/08/2008. EasyTag is a graphical utility to edit the descriptive [ID3 lastmod: 2021-01-28 tags] for your music files. One will think primarily of MP3 files, but it also does other formats, such as Ogg, FLAC, MP4/AAC, MusePack, Monkey’s Audio files and WavPack files (APE tag).
